title: The Real Story Behind What Soros Is Up To (Ep 1416)
description:
In this episode, I discuss the troubling new revelations about George Soros’ role in the transformation of American. I also discuss the latest court cases, which the media is ignoring, in the election 2020 malfeasance. 

News Picks:

Michigan legislature is subpoenaing election hard drives and laptops.

Pennsylvania republicans request high court review of election. 


How are the coming governor’s races shaping up? 


Excellent news, Trump is considering a special prosecutor to investigate Hunter Biden.


Tucker Carlson drops a bombshell on the Bidens.

Why is Mitch McConnell congratulating Joe Biden? 


The article discussed in the show about Soros funding radical DA races.


This photo of Joe Biden should have the press scrambling for answers.

The first John Solomon article on Soros, which was mentioned in today’s show.

Solomon article 2.

Solomon article 3.
